title: Connecting the Dots Between Reconstruction and Jim Crow
description: Henry Louis Gates Jr. talks about “Stony the Road” and “Dark Sky Rising,” and David Wallace-Wells discusses “The Uninhabitable Earth.”
author: books@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
